name: part_008
file: tmp_【#いろはにコラボ】祝！恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信！ [qgVPqPYGoTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The group finishes the 1.2x speed dance challenge and receives a passing grade from the management staff.
Fubuki announces the next challenge is 1.3x speed, much to the surprise of Ayame and Mio.
Performance of the chorus of 'Rinjou Shika' at 1.3x speed.
The group reacts to the speed, and they watch a replay of their 1.3x performance.
The judgment for 1.3x speed is shown: Fubuki passes, but Ayame and Mio fail.
Ayame and Mio beg for another chance, which the management grants after consulting the audience.
The next challenge is set to an even faster 1.4x speed.
Performance of the chorus of 'Rinjou Shika' at 1.4x speed.
After a replay and final judgment, all three members pass the 1.4x speed challenge.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと踊れてる！踊れてる！
subtitles.english: We're actually dancing it! We're doing it!

subtitles.original: ミオちゃん、ミオちゃん！
subtitles.english: Mio-chan, Mio-chan!

subtitles.original: できてる、できてる！凄かったよ。
subtitles.english: We did it, we did it! That was amazing.

subtitles.original: 運営さんジャッジ、どうでしょう？
subtitles.english: Management judge, what do you think?

subtitles.original: 結果…判定は…
subtitles.english: The result... the judgment is...

subtitles.original: やったー！合格！
subtitles.english: Yay! We passed!

subtitles.original: 成功ということで、これですね！
subtitles.english: So it's a success! This is great!

subtitles.original: 本当に早いんですけど…
subtitles.english: It was really fast, but...

subtitles.original: 次は1.3倍が来ます！
subtitles.english: Next comes 1.3x speed!

subtitles.original: えええー！？
subtitles.english: Ehhh?!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、大丈夫。サビだけだから大丈夫。
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay. It's just the chorus, so it's fine.

subtitles.original: 続いていきましょう。ミュージック、スタート！
subtitles.english: Let's keep going. Music, start!

subtitles.original: 踊り明かせば あどけない
subtitles.english: Dancing through the night, so innocent

subtitles.original: 覗いて惑わす 桃色吐息
subtitles.english: Peering in and bewitching, pink-colored sighs

subtitles.original: 気付かぬ間にキラリ
subtitles.english: Sparkling before I even realize it

subtitles.original: 恋い慕う君へ
subtitles.english: Toward you, whom I love and long for

subtitles.original: 愛歌うように
subtitles.english: As if singing of my love

subtitles.original: 早い、早い！
subtitles.english: So fast, so fast!

subtitles.original: 足が…足が絡まっちゃったよこれ！
subtitles.english: My legs... my legs got all tangled up!

subtitles.original: リプレイいきましょう、こちら！
subtitles.english: Let's check the replay, over here!

subtitles.original: あ、足絡まっちゃう…
subtitles.english: Ah, the legs get tangled...

subtitles.original: 絡まるほど足が長くなくてよかったよ。
subtitles.english: I'm glad my legs weren't long enough to get that tangled.

subtitles.original: お嬢は言葉を失ってるし、
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan is lost for words,

subtitles.original: ミオちゃんは崩れ落ちてるし。
subtitles.english: and Mio-chan is collapsing.

subtitles.original: 判定はどうでしょうか、結果！
subtitles.english: How's the judgment? The result!

subtitles.original: 判定は…フブキちゃん合格、二人は不合格！
subtitles.english: The judgment... Fubuki-chan passed, but those two failed!

subtitles.original: 嘘でしょー！？あんなに頑張ったのに！
subtitles.english: No way! After all that hard work!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってくださいよ！
subtitles.english: Wait just a minute!

subtitles.original: すいません、もう一回お願いしてもいいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Sorry, could we please try one more time?

subtitles.original: お願いします！本当にお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please! We're begging you!

subtitles.original: リスナーさんにも聞いてみましょうか。
subtitles.english: Should we ask the listeners as well?

subtitles.original: ちょっとカメラさん、寄ってもらって。
subtitles.english: Camera-san, could you get a bit closer?

subtitles.original: リスナーさん的にはどうですか？
subtitles.english: What do the listeners think?

subtitles.original: 『いいよ』って言ってくれてますね。あ、『草』って。
subtitles.english: They're saying 'It's okay.' Oh, and 'lol'.

subtitles.original: もう一回！頑張ったから！可愛いからOKだって！
subtitles.english: One more time! Because we did our best! They said OK because we're cute!

subtitles.original: やったー！もう一回やりましょう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's do it again!

subtitles.original: さっきより早いですからね！
subtitles.english: It's going to be even faster than before!

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんも道連れということで。
subtitles.english: And Fubuki-chan is coming down with us.

subtitles.original: リスクが伴う、1.4倍速だそうです！
subtitles.english: With higher risks... it's 1.4x speed!

subtitles.original: ミュージック、スタート！
subtitles.english: Music, start!

subtitles.original: 踊り明かせば あどけない
subtitles.english: Dancing through the night, so innocent

subtitles.original: 覗いて惑わす 桃色吐息
subtitles.english: Peering in and bewitching, pink-colored sighs

subtitles.original: 気付かぬ間にキラリ
subtitles.english: Sparkling before I even realize it

subtitles.original: 恋い慕う君へ
subtitles.english: Toward you, whom I love and long for

subtitles.original: 愛歌うように
subtitles.english: As if singing of my love

subtitles.original: これはできたんじゃない！？凄かったよ！
subtitles.english: I think we did it! That was amazing!

subtitles.original: 判定は…あ、リプレイですね、失礼しました。
subtitles.english: The judgment is... oh, the replay first. My apologies.

subtitles.original: 判定はどうでしょうか、結果！
subtitles.english: How's the judgment? The result!

subtitles.original: 全員合格！やったー！！
subtitles.english: Everyone passed! Yay!!

subtitles.original: 1.4倍速、余裕だったんじゃないですか！？
subtitles.english: 1.4x speed was actually a breeze, wasn't it!?
